isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Rocker Arm Assembly, Camshaft Assembly, Tappets, and Push Rods - Remove

svcproc.title: Valve Lever and Rocker Arm Assembly

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, read all safety instructions in the "Safety Information" section of this manual.

To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, make sure the transmission is in neutral, parking brake is set, and wheels are blocked before doing diagnostic or service procedures on engine or vehicle.
To avoid serious personal injury or possible death, make sure that the engine has cooled down sufficiently before attempting to remove any components.

step1.para: Drain coolant to below head gasket joint.

caution.para: To avoid possible damage to valve train and engine, sufficiently loosen adjusting screw nuts.

step1.para: Loosen all valve lever and rocker arm adjusting screw nuts two full turns.
Loosen and remove six valve lever and rocker arm bracket bolts (long cylinder head bolts).
Lift valve lever and rocker arm assembly from cylinder head.
Remove six long bolts and washers from valve lever and rocker arm assembly.
